snippet: The best writer in a baseball uniform, Dirk Hayhurst pitched briefly for the 2008 San Diego Padres and the 2009 Toronto Blue Jays, and is now leaving the country to play and write in Italy.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column profiles Dirk Hayhurst, who has written two books about his middling career as an MLB pitcher; after being passed over in free agency, Hayhurst has struck a deal to pitch professionally in Italy.
lead_paragraph: The best writer in a baseball uniform, Dirk Hayhurst pitched briefly for the 2008 San Diego Padres and the 2009 Toronto Blue Jays, and is now leaving the country to play and write in Italy.

headline.main: Far From a Storybook Ending, a So-So Pitcher Turns the Page
headline.print_headline: Far From a Storybook Ending, A So-So Pitcher Turns the Page
